'''Peter Hont''' is an Audio Director<ref>https://se.linkedin.com/in/peterhont</ref> for [[Mojang Studios]] who helped compose the music for ''[[Minecraft Dungeons]]'', both for the [[MCD:Mainland|Mainland]] levels and all current DLC levels.<ref>https://www.minecraft.net/en-us/article/the-sound-scary</ref> He is most known for his [[Minecraft Dungeons:Original Game Soundtrack|''Minecraft Dungeons: Original Game Soundtrack'']] album.

== Official ''Minecraft Dungeons'' soundtracks ==
*[[Minecraft Dungeons:Original Game Soundtrack|Minecraft Dungeons (Original Game Soundtrack)]] (June 24, 2020)
*[[Minecraft Dungeons:Jungle Awakens (Original Game Soundtrack)|Minecraft Dungeons: Jungle Awakens (Original Game Soundtrack)]] (June 24, 2020)
*[[Minecraft Dungeons:Creeping Winter (Original Game Soundtrack)|Minecraft Dungeons: Creeping Winter (Original Game Soundtrack)]] (November 5, 2020)
*[[Minecraft Dungeons:Howling Peaks (Original Game Soundtrack)|Minecraft Dungeons: Howling Peaks (Original Game Soundtrack)]] (December 1, 2020)
*[[Minecraft Dungeons:Flames of the Nether (Original Game Soundtrack)|Minecraft Dungeons: Flames of the Nether (Original Game Soundtrack)]] (February 19, 2021)
*[[Minecraft Dungeons:Hidden Depths (Original Game Soundtrack)|Minecraft Dungeons: Hidden Depths (Original Game Soundtrack)]] (May 25, 2021)
*[[Minecraft Dungeons:Echoing Void (Original Game Soundtrack)|Minecraft Dungeons: Echoing Void (Original Game Soundtrack)]] (July 25, 2021)
*[[Minecraft Dungeons:Ultimate DLC Bundle|Minecraft Dungeons: Ultimate Additions (Original Game Soundtrack)]] (October 20, 2021)
*[[Minecraft Dungeons:Seasonal Adventures (Original Game Soundtrack)|Minecraft Dungeons: Seasonal Adventures (Original Game Sountrack)]] (June 5, 2023)
